name: Cell Phone and Ink Jet Recycling Fundraiser
description: Cell Phone and Ink Jet Recycling Fundraiser
hours: Monday: 9:00 AM - 8:00 PM Tuesday: 9:00 AM - 8:00 PM Wednesday: 9:00 AM - 8:00 PM Thursday: 9:00 AM - 8:00 PM Friday: 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM
materials: Cell Phones; Inkjet Printer Cartridges; Laser Toner Cartridges; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; Electronics; Laptop Computers; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Small Televisions; Tablets; Televisions; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes:
Recycling helps our environment and our community!  Church of the Annunciation is accepting old cell phones and empty ink jet cartridges.  Funds raised through this recycling program will be used to support parish activities and our community outreach programs.

Cell phones and ink jet cartridges may be dropped off at our Parish Center (49 Demarest Road, Paramus, NJ) Monday to Thursday from 9 a.m. to 8 p.m. and Friday from 9 a.m. to 4 p.m.  Drop boxes are also available in the Gathering Space of the Church (50 W Midland Avenue, Paramus, NJ).  The church is open Monday to Thursday from 9 a.m. to 3:30 p.m., Saturday from 8:30 a.m. to 6:30 p.m. and Sunday from 7:30 a.m. to 1:30 p.m.
